name: 張延光
objective:
本課程著重於電腦輔助製造的基本概念與實作教學。教學重點以務實的角度切入從設計者的需求中啟發如何應用數位製造的軟體(CAD/CAM)及設備(CNC Engraving Machine、Laser Engraving Machine、3D Printer)來輔助創作或生產製造。以創客(Marker)常用的軟體(Vcarve Pro/ Fusion 360)教學進行數位設計後，輔以CNC設備教學及實際操作進行數位加工製造。
This course focuses on the basic concepts and practical teaching of computer-aided manufacturing. The emphasis of the teaching is to pragmatically enlighten from the needs of designers how to apply digital manufacturing software (CAD / CAM) and equipment (CNC Engraving Machine, Laser Engraving Machine, 3D Printer) to assist creation or manufacturing. After digital design is carried out with software (Vcarve Pro / Fusion 360) commonly used by Marker, it is supplemented with CNC equipment teaching and practical operations for digital processing and manufacturing.
